maintainer.name: Gentoo network monitoring and analysis project

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Netperf is a benchmark that can be used to measure the performance of many different types of networking. It provides tests for both unidirectional throughput, and end-to-end latency. The environments currently measureable by netperf include:
- TCP and UDP via BSD Sockets for both IPv4 and IPv6 - DLPI - Unix Domain Sockets - SCTP for both IPv4 and IPv6

use.flag: Emit interim results during the run. May affect results
